# 
 T^T

VPS

# 
- [nodejs](http://nodejs.org/)
- [git](http://git-scm.com/)
- hexo
    - `npm install -g hexo`
- 
    - `mkdir blog`
- 
    - `cd blog`
    - `hexo init`
- 
    - `cd blog`
    - `npm install`
- 
    - `hexo s`
    ```
    [root@bwh themes]# hexo s
    INFO  Start processing
    INFO  Hexo is running at http://localhost:4000/. Press Ctrl+C to stop.
    ```
    - `localhost:4000`

# 
- [Themes-Hexo](https://hexo.io/themes/)
- `themes`
- `_config.yml`
```
# Extensions
## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/
## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/
theme: next # 
```
- Hexo  landscapenextNext
> [Next](https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next/releases)

> [Next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/)
-

``` ## SEO ### sitemap - Sitemap - `npm install hexo-generator-sitemap --save``npm install hexo-generator-baidu-sitemap --save``sitemap` - `hexo g` - `` ``` # Sitemap Setting sitemap: path: sitemap.xml baidusitemap: path: baidusitemap.xml ``` ### robots.txt - source ``` User-agent: * Allow: / Allow: /archives/ Disallow: /js/ Disallow: /css/ Disallow: /fonts/ Disallow: /lib/ Disallow: /fancybox/ Sitemap: http://www.cylong.com/sitemap.xml Sitemap: http://www.cylong.com/baidusitemap.xml ``` ## - `hexo-wordcount``npm install hexo-wordcount --save` - `` ``` # word_count: true ``` - `/themes/next/layout/_partials/footer.swig` ```

``` # - version: 6.0.3 ## Scheme - `Scheme``NexT` - `Scheme``NexT` - `Scheme` - `NexT``Scheme` - `Muse` - `Scheme` `NexT` - `Mist` - `Muse` - `Pisces` - `Scheme` - `Scheme````scheme``Scheme``scheme``#` ``` # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Scheme Settings # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Schemes #scheme: Muse #scheme: Mist scheme: Pisces #scheme: Gemini ``` ## - ```language` - [](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/getting-started.html#select-language) - ``` language: zh-CN ``` ## ### - - - - `NexT``Font Awesome``Font Awesome``600+``Retina` - `` - `menu``item name: link``item name` ``` # --------------------------------------------------------------- # Menu Settings # --------------------------------------------------------------- # When running the site in a subdirectory (e.g. domain.tld/blog), remove the leading slash from link value (/archives -> archives). # Usage: `Key: /link/ || icon` # Key is the name of menu item. If translate for this menu will find in languages - this translate will be loaded; if not - Key name will be used. Key is case-senstive. # Value before `||` delimeter is the target link. # Value after `||` delimeter is the name of FontAwesome icon. If icon (with or without delimeter) is not specified, question icon will be loaded. menu: home: / || home archives: /archives/ || archive tags: /tags/ || tags categories: /categories/ || th about: /about/ || user #schedule: /schedule/ || calendar #sitemap: /sitemap.xml || sitemap #commonweal: /404/ || heartbeat ``` - `/` - `NexT` | | ---|--- | --- home | home: / | archives | archives: /archives | categories | categories: /categories | ** tags | tags: /tags | ** about | about: /about | ** commonweal | commonweal: /404.html | * 404* - Hexo `NexT``languages/{language}.yml``{language}` `something``languages/zh-Hans.yml` ### - `source``tags` - `tags``index.md` ``` --- title: date: 2018-02-04 21:33:54 type: "tags" comments: false --- ``` ### - `source``categories` - `categories``index.md` ``` --- title: date: 2018-02-04 21:33:54 type: "categories" comments: false --- ``` ### - `source``about` - `about``index.md``github` ## - ```sidebar` - - `sidebar.position` - `left` - - `right` - ``` sidebar: position: left ``` - `sidebar.display` - `post` - - `always` - - `hide` - - `remove` - ``` sidebar: display: post ``` ## - `` `avatar` - - URI - - `source/uploads/``uploads``avatar:/uploads/avatar.png` - `source/images/``avatar: /images/avatar.png` ``` # Avatar avatar: /images/avatar.jpg ``` ## - `` - `author` ## - `` - `description`:) ## - `` - `auto_excerpt` ``` auto_excerpt: enable: true length: 300 ``` ## more - `` - `scroll_to_more``false` ## fontawesome * 2018-02-12* `fontawesome``css``fontawesome``css` ```fontAwesome``cdn` ``` fontawesome: https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css ``` # ## - [](http://tongji.baidu.com/), - hm.js? id ![image](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/uploads/five-minutes-setup/analytics-baidu-id.png) - `` `baidu_analytics``id` ## - - [](https://www.google.com/intl/zh-CN/analytics/) - `id` - `` `google_analytics``id` ## Disqus - [Disqus](https://disqus.com/) - `Admin` - `I want to install Disqus on my site` - `Website Name` - - disqushexodisqushexohexodisqus ![image](http://img.blog.csdn.net/20160220003532601) - `config.yml` ``` # Disqus disqus: enable: true shortname: winsky #Website Name count: true lazyload: false ``` ## - ```busuanzi_count` ``` busuanzi_count: # count values only if the other configs are false enable: true # custom uv span for the whole site site_uv: true site_uv_header: site_uv_footer: # custom pv span for the whole site site_pv: true site_pv_header: site_pv_footer: # custom pv span for one page only page_pv: true page_pv_header: page_pv_footer: ``` > [][] # > [next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/) > [Hexo+nexT](http://www.wuxubj.cn/2016/08/Hexo-nexT-build-personal-blog/) > [Hexo NexT](https://eason-yang.com/2016/11/05/add-word-count-to-hexo-next/) > [Github hexo disqusRSS](http://blog.csdn.net/u010053344/article/details/50701191) --- [1]: https://bwh1.net/aff.php?aff=24742 "VPS" [2]: https://blog.winsky.wang/2018/02/03/%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E5%8D%9A%E5%AE%A2Hexo%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA/ "" []: http://ibruce.info/2015/04/04/busuanzi/ ""

## webhook
`hexo``NodeJS``NodeJS``github``push`
`github-webhook-handler`
```
npm install github-webhook-handler
```
`webhooks.js`
```
var http = require('http')
var createHandler = require('github-webhook-handler')
var handler = createHandler({ path: '/webhooks_push', secret: 'winsky_nju' })
//  secret  GitHub 
function run_cmd(cmd, args, callback) {
  var spawn = require('child_process').spawn;
  var child = spawn(cmd, args);
  var resp = "";
  child.stdout.on('data', function(buffer) { resp += buffer.toString(); });
  child.stdout.on('end', function() { callback (resp) });
}
handler.on('error', function (err) {
  console.error('Error:', err.message)
})
handler.on('push', function (event) {
  console.log('Received a push event for %s to %s',
    event.payload.repository.name,
    event.payload.ref);
    run_cmd('sh', ['./deploy.sh'], function(text){ console.log(text) });
})
try {
  http.createServer(function (req, res) {
    handler(req, res, function (err) {
      res.statusCode = 404
      res.end('no such location')
    })
  }).listen(6666)
}catch(err){
  console.error('Error:', err.message)
}
```
`secret``github``webhooks``6666``./deploy.sh``push``shell``webhooks.js``path: '/webhooks_push'``github`

`Nginx``Nginx`6666`Nginx``webhooks.conf`
```
server
{
    listen 80;
    server_name git.winsky.wang ;

	location / {
		proxy_set_header HOST $host;
		proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
		proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
		proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_pass http://localhost:6666/;
    }
}
```

source /etc/profile
source ~/bash_profile

cd /home/blog

hexo s &
```

`/etc/rc.d/rc.local``/home/blog/auto_start.sh 2>&1 > /dev/null &``/etc/rc.d/rc.local`

Post._content:
`https`

[Let's Encrypt][1]`ISRG``Internet Security Research Group``ISRG``Let's Encrypt``Mozilla``Cisco``Akamai``Electronic Frontier Foundation``Chrome`

<!-- more -->
`Let's Encrypt`90

# 
[Certbot][2]`Let's Encrypt``Let's Encrypt``Certbot``Unix``CentOS``HTTPS`

- `Certbot`
	- `wget https://dl.eff.org/certbot-auto`
	- `chmod +x certbot-auto`
- 
	- `webroot`
		- `certbot certonly --webroot -w /var/www/example -d example.com -d www.example.com`
		- `example.com``www.example.com``--webroot``/var/www/example``.well-known``certbot``example.com/.well-known/acme-challenge`
	- `standalone`
		- `--webroot``certbot``--standalone`443`nginx`443
		- `certbot certonly --standalone -d example.com -d www.example.com`
		- `/etc/letsencrypt/live/`

# NginxHTTPS
Nginx Nginx
```
server
{
    listen 443;
    server_name blog.winsky.wang ;
    ssl on;
    ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/blog.winsky.wang/fullchain.pem;
    ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/blog.winsky.wang/privkey.pem;
		
	location / {
		proxy_set_header HOST $host;
		proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
		proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
		proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_pass http://localhost:4000/;
    }
}

server
{
    listen 80;
    server_name blog.winsky.wang ;
		
	location / {
		proxy_set_header HOST $host;
		proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
		proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
		proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_pass http://localhost:4000/;
    }
    # rewrite ^/(.*) https://$server_name$1 permanent;#Https
}
```

# SSL
`Let's Encrypt`90`certbot``certbot renew`


`certbot renew --dry-run `
```
Attempting to renew cert (blog.winsky.wang) from /etc/letsencrypt/renewal/blog.winsky.wang.conf produced an unexpected error: Problem binding to port 80: Could not bind to IPv4 or IPv6.. Skipping.
All renewal attempts failed. The following certs could not be renewed:
  /etc/letsencrypt/live/blog.winsky.wang/fullchain.pem (failure)
```
`--standalone`443`nginx``service nginx stop`

90 `certbot-auto-renew-cron``cron``4:00`
```
00 4 * */2 * certbot renew --pre-hook "service nginx stop" --post-hook "service nginx start"
```
- `--pre-hook`
- `--post-hook`

`crontab certbot-auto-renew-cron`

# 


## Python
`CentOS 6.6``Python``2.6.6``No supported Python package available to install. Aborting bootstrap!`Python
```
wget http://python.org/ftp/python/2.7.3/Python-2.7.3.tar.bz2 #Python-2.7.3
tar -jxvf Python-2.7.3.tar.bz2 #
cd Python-2.7.3 #
./configure #
make all #
make install #
make clean #
make distclean #
/usr/local/bin/python2.7 -V  #
mv /usr/bin/python /usr/bin/python2.6.6 # python python2.7
ln -s /usr/local/bin/python2.7 /usr/bin/python # python python2.7
python -V #Python 
vi /usr/bin/yum  ##!/usr/bin/python #!/usr/bin/python2.6.6
```

## 
`certbot certonly --standalone -d blog.winsky.wang``Nginx``Nginx`

> [Let's Encrypt SSL HTTPS](https://diamondfsd.com/article/e221b455-b0e7-40b7-a6c7-9bb7e3e35657)

> [VPSLets EncryptSSL](https://www.wn789.com/14419.html)
